```{r schedule, echo=FALSE}
suppressMessages(sched_df <- readxl::read_excel("misc/MED131_lectures.xlsx"))

sched_df$Slides <- sched_df$`R script` <- NULL
colnames(sched_df)[4] <- "review"
sched_df$review[is.na(sched_df$review)] <- ""
sched_df$review[14] <- "Review before final"

# links to lectures
sched_df$Subject[1] <- kableExtra::cell_spec(sched_df$Subject[1], "html", link = "https://github.com/egeulgen/MED131_21_22/blob/main/lectures/1.descriptive.pdf")
sched_df$Subject[2] <- kableExtra::cell_spec(sched_df$Subject[2], "html", link = "https://github.com/egeulgen/MED131_21_22/blob/main/lectures/2.descriptive.pdf")
sched_df$Subject[3] <- kableExtra::cell_spec(sched_df$Subject[3], "html", link = "https://github.com/egeulgen/MED131_21_22/blob/main/lectures/3.hypothesis_testing_one_sample.pdf")
sched_df$Subject[4] <- kableExtra::cell_spec(sched_df$Subject[4], "html", link = "https://github.com/egeulgen/MED131_21_22/blob/main/lectures/4.two_sample.pdf")

kableExtra::row_spec(kableExtra::row_spec(knitr::kable(sched_df, format = "html", escape = FALSE), which(grepl("Midterm", sched_df$Subject)), bold = TRUE, background = "#F4B41A"), nrow(sched_df), bold = TRUE, background = "#E2725A")
```
